desc: We carry all the gear that you need to maximize your days on the water with your dog. Dog life vests, themed life jackets, decals, leashes, towels, and everything else you need for boat, kayak, canoe, sailing, and SUP trips with man's best friend.

layout.text: Your number one resource for on the water adventures with your furry friends. Dog Life Jackets, leashes, collars, decals, and everything else you need for boating, canoeing, kayaking, sailing, or SUPing. We have what your dog needs.
